   tathā purāṇa vrātānāṃ śrīmad bhāgavataṃ dvijāḥ // BhP_12.13.017 //	taTA purANa vrAtAnAm SrImat  BAgavatam dvijAH // BhP_12.13.017 //
   śrīmad bhāgavataṃ purāṇam amalaṃ yad vaiṣṇavānāṃ priyaṃ $ yasmin	SrImat  BAgavatam purANam amalam yat vEzNavAnAm priyam $ yasmin
   pāramahaṃsyam ekam amalaṃ jñānaṃ paraṃ gīyate &	pAramahaMsyam ekam amalam jQAnam param gIyate &
   tatra jñāna virāga bhakti sahitaṃ naiṣkarmyam āviskṛtaṃ % tac chṛṇvan	tatra jQAna virAga  Bakti  sahitam nEzkarmyam AviskRtam % tat SRNvan
   su paṭhan vicāraṇa paro bhaktyā vimucyen naraḥ // BhP_12.13.018 //*	su paWan vicAraNa  paraH BaktyA vimucyet naraH // BhP_12.13.018 //*
   kasmai yena vibhāsito 'yam atulo jñāna pradīpaḥ purā $ tad rūpeṇa ca	kasmE yena viBAsitaH ayam atulaH jQAna  pradIpaH purA $ tad  rUpeNa ca
   nāradāya munaye kṛṣṇāya tad rūpiṇā &	nAradAya munaye kRzNAya tad  rUpiNA &
   yogīndrāya tad ātmanātha bhagavad rātāya kāruṇyatas % tac chuddhaṃ vimalaṃ	yogi indrAya tat  AtmanA aTa Bagavat  rAtAya kAruNyataH % tat SudDam vimalam
   viśokam amṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ dhīmahi // BhP_12.13.019 //*	viSokam amRtam satyam param DImahi // BhP_12.13.019 //*
   namas tasmai bhagavate vāsudevāya sākṣiṇe /	namaH tasmE Bagavate vAsudevAya sAkziNe /
   ya idam kṛpayā kasmai vyācacakṣe mumukṣave // BhP_12.13.020 //	yaH idam kRpayA kasmE vyAcacakze mumukzave // BhP_12.13.020 //
   yogīndrāya namas tasmai śukāya brahma rūpiṇe /	yogi indrAya namaH tasmE SukAya brahma rUpiNe /
   saṃsāra sarpa daṣṭaṃ yo viṣṇu rātam amūmucat // BhP_12.13.021 //	saMsAra  sarpa  dazwam yaH vizNu rAtam amUmucat // BhP_12.13.021 //
   bhave bhave yathā bhaktiḥ pādayos tava jāyate /	Bave Bave yaTA BaktiH pAdayoH tava jAyate /
   tathā kuruṣva deveśa nāthas tvaṃ no yataḥ prabho // BhP_12.13.022 //	taTA kuruzva deveSa nATaH tvam naH yatas praBo // BhP_12.13.022 //
   nāma saṅkīrtanaṃ yasya sarva pāpa praṇāśanam /	nAma  saFkIrtanam yasya sarva pApa praNASanam /
   praṇāmo duḥkha śamanas taṃ namāmi hariṃ param // BhP_12.13.023 //	praNAmaH duHKa SamanaH tam namAmi harim param // BhP_12.13.023 //
